itunes:title: This Is the Church Week 2 with Sam and Toni Collier
title: This Is the Church Week 2 with Sam and Toni Collier
description:
On this week’s episode, Amanda joins Sam and Toni Collier to continue our study of the Church. Sam is a local church pastor and author, and his wife Toni is a ministry leader and author. Together they begin to explore some of the metaphors found in Scripture that describe Christ’s relationship with His Church and believers’ relationships with one another. Join us in listening as we are reminded of the beauty of the diverse body of Christ and what is possible when each unique believer is empowered by the Spirit and in pursuit of the same mission. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Church reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Church collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-church-week-2-with-sam-and-toni-collier
